short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Use the context menu to search on a list of varius e-commerce websites!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Select a product name and search it on a list of E-commerce sites!

1) Select the text;
2) Right click to open the context menù;
3) Search it!

You can select your favorite sites from option menù!

Google Shopping
Amazon
Ebay
Banggood
Facebook
Alibaba
Aliexpress
GearBest

Suggest new sites to insert in this list!
